name: blog-app
description: Full-stack blog application with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:e2e: NODE_ENV=test && concurrently "npm run dev:backend:e2e" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build:start: npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.start:with-build: npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.start:prod: NODE_ENV=production && cd backend && npm run start:prod
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test && concurrently "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:frontend"
scripts.test:all: NODE_ENV=test && npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../e2e && npm install
